alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 6:04PM MDT until June 19 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Haakon County in west central South Dakota... Northwestern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 603 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Quinn to 3 miles southeast of Cottonwood to near Kadoka, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Philip around 615 PM MDT. Grindstone around 620 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Grindstone Butte, Ottumwa, Billsburg and Milesville. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 142 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
